channel.title: Whats the Best?
channel.description: Hello i am making a dedicated private server but i need the best free Forums hosting so pleace tell me the best webhost you use i use www(.)n e w r u n e s e r v e r(.)co.ccSo plzz request something Ps i need staff so make a application

item.title: Whats the Best?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:3, topic:236655”]Get to know people first, and then perhaps ask them to join your fleet.

It takes time to create servers, this isn’t a quick thing.[/quote]And it also takes time to get them populated, and especially forums populated.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the Best?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Just host the site alongside the private server? If you’re hosting it on a dedi/vps/computer…

Also, recruiting staff via applications is the worst idea ever. Choose trusted players that play for a while and are interested in the game not just there for staff.

Read full topic
